content: let s get crocheting about this free pattern is my first published crochet design i did not have any testers for this pattern so i appreciate your feedback with a honeycomb inspired design and handmade warmth this bag is a sweet little nudge to bee kind--- because kindness is always in style i gifted this bag to my mother-in-law and she was elated designer my name is theresa randall and i rediscovered knitting and crocheting during covid and haven t looked back i love designing almost everything i make so hope to spread my designs to others as i learn more about pattern making
